Text: i was getting ready to download, but then i saw the album art, and i was like hey ive got that cd. then i pick up the cd case and its empty. the cd was in my stereo already =P
thanks,i've been looking for this for some time now.

Funny thing about this, it doesn't appear on Phil's discography wikipedia page.  The CD ...Hits was released in 1998 and in 2008, and the page for the album doesn't list 2 discs.  It has a lot of these songs, but not in your order... I'm not accusing you of anything, I'm just confused as to what manner of sorcery is employed here.
